content: Interesting, thank you for this awesome article, Shalvah! I really appreciate your time putting it together for us. It definitely got my programming juices flowing :) I spent some time this afternoon looking into more info in this stuff (Wikipedia mainly just for the hard no bs facts… haha) and was quite excited to learn about it as it’s not something I’ve ever had to think about, because of this article, which you presented very well!
